title: http://tour.golang.org/#6 use an invalid constant (math.pi instead of math.Pi)
body:
by **jorgen@wahlsten.com**: 
Going through the language tour on slide 6 (http://tour.golang.org/#6) the constant pi
has the wrong case:

    fmt.Println(math.pi)

and when run produce an error:

  prog.go:9: cannot refer to unexported name math.pi
  prog.go:9: undefined: math.pi
   [process exited with non-zero status]

The constant should be capitalized:

    fmt.Println(math.Pi)
